Functions

Function(s) admin.delete_part_shopcustomermailtransmissionstatehistorydo.
To be used as Database Job. Remove the old history of successful mail transmissions, except the last state (6000=TRANSMISSIONED). example: select admin.delete_part_shopcustomermailtransmissionstatehistorydo('{"days2keep": 60, "batchsize": 1000}');

FUNCTION admin.delete_part_shopcustomermailtransmissionstatehistorydo ( config json ) RETURNS integer LANGUAGE 'plpgsql' volatile;
